snippet: The deal between Extell and Related Companies would make Related the largest landowner in the 50-block Hudson Yards district on the Far West Side of Manhattan.
abstract: Related Companies may swap land with rival developer Extell for more in Hudson Yards, where it has started the first office tower in a $15-billion commercial and residential complex; under proposal, Related would agree to buy one-acre site owned by Extell on east side of 11th Avenue, while Related and Boston Properties would sell Extell small parcel on the east side of Eighth Avenue.
lead_paragraph: The deal between Extell and Related Companies would make Related the largest landowner in the 50-block Hudson Yards district on the Far West Side of Manhattan.

headline.seo: Related Companies May Swap Land for More in Hudson Yards
headline.main: Developer May Swap Land for More in Hudson Yards
headline.print_headline: Developer May Swap Land for More in Hudson Yards
